EmailTemplate.name: 8130 tag eligibility/C of C
EmailTemplate.subject: Missing Information, {!Case.Subject}; {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Please provide the following information to place your order:
1. End User (EU) and Final Destination (FD) - are required for the products under this PO to comply with U.S. Export Regulations (Part 736 and 744). U.S. Export Administration Regulations URL: http://www.access.gpo.gov/bis/ear/ear_data.html.
EU: FD:
2. This P/N ___________________________ may not be eligible for 8130 Tags. To further research please provide:
Cage Code: Next Higher Assembly: End Item: Component Maintenance Manual:
3. Please confirm acceptance of Certificate of Conformance.
Date: Signature:
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
